story.title: Furkan's Story
story.paragraph1: 3-year-old Furkan is fighting Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD). This progressive muscle disease causes muscles to weaken over time.
story.paragraph2: Elevidys gene therapy in Dubai is a ray of hope for Furkan. However, time is very critical for this treatment - there are age and weight criteria.
